short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connects you through a zenVPN Proxy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online privacy and freedom with the zenVPN Chrome extension! Getting started is easy — just create an account at zenvpn.net and choose a plan that fits your needs, from our free option to our business-tier subscriptions.

The zenVPN plugin offers two modes:
- Site Tunneling — Choose specific websites to open from a different location while leaving other traffic untouched.
- Full Tunneling (Basic VPN) — Route all your traffic securely through a selected location for complete coverage.
No need for a separate client—just add zenVPN to Chrome, sign in, and browse securely from anywhere!
